Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement OAuth2 + OPA multi-tenant authentication and authorization

Add Spring Boot 3.3 backend with complete OAuth2/Keycloak integration and
OPA-based policy authorization for multi-tenant SaaS architecture.

## Backend (Spring Boot 3.3 + Java 21)
- OAuth2 Resource Server with JWT validation
- Keycloak 26 integration (configurable for local/dev environments)
- Custom JWT authentication converter extracting roles
- Multi-tenant context filter with X-Tenant-Id header support
- OPA authorization service for RBAC and business rules
- Test controller endpoints (public and protected)
- PostgreSQL database with Flyway migrations
- Multi-tenant schema with RLS-ready structure

## Infrastructure
- Keycloak setup scripts (local port 8081, dev port 8080)
- Docker Compose with PostgreSQL, Redis, Keycloak, OPA
- OPA policies for RBAC and approval authority (alÃ§ada)
- Environment separation: LOCAL vs DEV profiles

## Database
- Multi-tenant tables (tenant, plano, assinatura, usuario, membro)
- Operational tables (modelo, jetski, reserva, locacao, etc.)
- Composite indexes for tenant_id + foreign keys
- Seed data for development

## Testing
- Unit tests for TenantContext and TenantFilter
- Integration-ready with Testcontainers support

## Configuration
- application-local.yml: Local development (Keycloak 8081, PostgreSQL 5433)
- application-dev.yml: Docker environment (Keycloak 8080, PostgreSQL 5432)
- application-test.yml: Test profile configuration
